title: stuck low priority queue
body:
ok so i got placed into low priority queue for no reason at all i idle for about 2-3mins in base max and i get a 40 min queue time from leave buster that just resets over and over and over and has no end to it been like this the past 6 hours it never matches me with a game at all
how the fuck do you get rid of this bullshit

replies.body: prior to this i had never been in low priorty queue before and bam i get the 40min queue i hear others have got 5 min 20 min queues 1st not straight into 40 wtf

> prior to this i had never been in low priorty queue before and bam i get the 40min queue i hear others have got 5 min 20 min queues 1st not straight into 40 wtf

Yeah, my smurf is on 5 minutes and my main is on 20, I've never heard of 40 until your case showed up.

{{champion:38}} {{item:3003}}

3 minutes is all it takes for leavebuster to get you. Personally I'd like to know why you were idling. The fact that your were not only placed in low priority queue but were given a 40 minute wait period suggests you've been classified as a leaver or AFK by leavebuster an excessive number of times, so in that respect it's your fault. As for the resetting you should contact support.

waiting 30secs in base for item buying then dancing around inhib for 2min waiting for an engage 
the ones before that were short base idles while the rest of my team agree'd to let them end which were something like 1-2mins 
the queue starts at 40min counts down to 30 then resets back to 40mins it doesnt match me in a game during that 10 mins at all i left it running in queue last night woke up and it said failed to join queue so i queued this morning and the timer is at 40mins 
the thing that got me in this in the 1st place was a power outage from a lightening storm a few weeks back here in south australia where it asked to type I AGREE in the box when i eventually got back online

> [{quoted}](name=Helblinde,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bWAIGjhQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-15T02:19:29.288+0000)
> waiting 30secs in base for item buying then **dancing around inhib for 2min waiting for an engage**

Then why did you say you were idle for 2-3 mins when you obviously were not?

because walking back in fourth in base counts as idle doesnt it ( i know idle means standing still doing nothing) but recently before this low queue i had been getting afk msgs after games for dancing around in base waiting for an engage or waiting out the inevitable loss (1min max) the game that got me into this mess was just me sitting in base waiting dancing around for an engage or them to make a mistake we lost, the game ended and the low priorty queue msg pops up straight after the game the most i had actually idle for was 30-1min maximum the system is obviously a load of %%%% since alot of people are having the same problem i have with the queue looping and never actually ending or idling longer than 2mins ya know some people have to up and open the door for people coming around or letting their pets out this is just usual riot bull%%%% as usual.

> [{quoted}](name=Helblinde,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bWAIGjhQ,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-15T04:38:35.455+0000)
> because walking back in fourth in base counts as idle doesnt it

No, it doesn't. In order to be considered AFK by the game you'd need to be in the fountain doing nothing (which is what is considered idle, both by the game and by definition). Considering everything you've said I would strongly suggest contacting support to resolve the situation. I don't know what actually happened but, based on what you're saying, you seem to have not been idle for long enough to be given leavebuster punishments.

Only my guess though
